name: Miami Gliders
about: Miami Gliders, located just 45 minutes south of Miami, is South Florida's premier site for glider flight training. Our facility, situated near the Florida Keys and Everglades National Park, offers a unique and exhilarating flying experience. Led by FAA-certified pilots and flight instructors, we prioritize safety, excellence, and fun. Our instructors guide students through a self-directed home-study course and face-to-face classes, preparing them for the FAA Private Pilot Certificate or Glider Add-On. Once certified, pilots can enjoy flying with friends and family, or solo, and even participate in international glider events. With a commitment to professionalism and a passion for flying, Miami Gliders welcomes you to discover the thrill of soaring through South Florida's skies.
